text.section: The military family assistance trust fund is created as a separate revolving fund. The trust fund shall consist of grants, contributions, appropriations, or other moneys made available for the purpose of the trust fund.
Trust fund amounts not expended at the close of a fiscal year shall not lapse but shall be carried forward to the next fiscal year.
Any interest earnings of the trust fund shall become a part of the trust fund and shall not lapse.

law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 252, Pt. XXVIII, sec. 1, effective April 25, 2006.
